      • readString

        public java.lang.String readString(int length)
                            throws TransportException
        Read string by it length. Use this method only when sure no character accept ASCII will be read. Use readBytes and character encoding conversion instead.
        Returns:
        String read
        Throws:
        TransportException

      • readString

        public java.lang.String readString()
                            throws TransportException
        Read 32-bit string length and then string themself by it length Use this method only when sure no character accept ASCII will be read. Use readBytes and character encoding conversion instead or readUtf8String() method when utf-8 encoding needed.
        Returns:
        String read
        Throws:
        TransportException

      • readUtf8String

        public java.lang.String readUtf8String()
                                throws TransportException
        Read 32-bit string length and then string themself by it length Assume UTF-8 character encoding used
        Returns:
        String read
        Throws:
        TransportException
